Name: [Affinity] My BGM is On
Desc: Billy has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Roaming Gunslinger]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Billy hums the theme song to Starlight Knights while confidently declaring "Nobody can beat me while my BGM is on!" Clearly... he's in high spirits.
